Installation
************

ESIpy can be installed through:

.. code-block:: bash
    pip install esipython

To install PySCF, following the official guidelines from `PySCF's installation guide`<https://pyscf.org/install.html>`_:

.. code-block:: bash
    pip install --prefer-binary pyscf

For a detailed explanation on how to run the code and how to customize it, please see the directory :ref:`examples.rst`
and the :class:`examples.rst` file.
